# D1 "Hellow World!" Example

Instructions:

* Make sure you have D1 enabled for your account.
* Read the D1 API for details
* Start coding

## Setup

```
npm install
```

## Test locally

```
npx wrangler dev
```

## Go live

```
npx wrangler publish
```

## Changelog

### 2022-05-27

* Client API library moved to "@cloudflare/d1"
